verses.verse: The word <WH1697> of the LORD <WH3068> came again unto me, saying <WH559>,

Son <WH1121> of man <WH120>, say <WH559> unto the prince <WH5057> of Tyrus <WH6865>, Thus saith <WH559> the Lord <WH136> GOD <WH3069>; Because thine heart <WH3820> is lifted up <WH1361>, and thou hast said <WH559>, I am a God <WH410>, I sit <WH3427> in the seat <WH4186> of God <WH430>, in the midst <WH3820> of the seas <WH3220>; yet thou art a man <WH120>, and not God <WH410>, though thou set <WH5414> thine heart <WH3820> as the heart <WH3820> of God <WH430>:
Behold, thou art wiser <WH2450> than Daniel <WH1840>; there is no secret <WH5640> that they can hide <WH6004> from thee:
With thy wisdom <WH2451> and with thine understanding <WH8394> thou hast gotten <WH6213> thee riches <WH2428>, and hast gotten <WH6213> gold <WH2091> and silver <WH3701> into thy treasures <WH214>:
By thy great <WH7230> wisdom <WH2451> and by thy traffick <WH7404> hast thou increased <WH7235> thy riches <WH2428>, and thine heart <WH3824> is lifted up <WH1361> because of thy riches <WH2428>:
Therefore thus saith <WH559> the Lord <WH136> GOD <WH3069>; Because thou hast set <WH5414> thine heart <WH3820> as the heart <WH3824> of God <WH430>;

Behold, therefore I will bring <WH935> strangers <WH2114> upon thee, the terrible <WH6184> of the nations <WH1471>: and they shall draw <WH7324> their swords <WH2719> against the beauty <WH3308> of thy wisdom <WH2451>, and they shall defile <WH2490> thy brightness <WH3314>.
They shall bring thee down <WH3381> to the pit <WH7845>, and thou shalt die <WH4191> the deaths <WH4463> of them that are slain <WH2491> in the midst <WH3820> of the seas <WH3220>.

Wilt thou yet <WH559> say <WH559> before <WH6440> him that slayeth <WH2026> thee, I am God <WH430>? but thou shalt be a man <WH120>, and no God <WH410>, in the hand <WH3027> of him that slayeth <WH2490> thee.
Thou shalt die <WH4191> the deaths <WH4194> of the uncircumcised <WH6189> by the hand <WH3027> of strangers <WH2114>: for I have spoken <WH1696> it, saith <WH5002> the Lord <WH136> GOD <WH3069>.
¶ Moreover the word <WH1697> of the LORD <WH3068> came unto me, saying <WH559>,

Son <WH1121> of man <WH120>, take up <WH5375> a lamentation <WH7015> upon the king <WH4428> of Tyrus <WH6865>, and say <WH559> unto him, Thus saith <WH559> the Lord <WH136> GOD <WH3069>; Thou sealest up <WH2856> the sum <WH8508>, full <WH4392> of wisdom <WH2451>, and perfect <WH3632> in beauty <WH3308>.

Thou hast been in Eden <WH5731> the garden <WH1588> of God <WH430>; every precious <WH3368> stone <WH68> was thy covering <WH4540>, the sardius <WH124>, topaz <WH6357>, and the diamond <WH3095>, the beryl <WH8658>, the onyx <WH7718>, and the jasper <WH3471>, the sapphire <WH5601>, the emerald <WH5306>, and the carbuncle <WH1304>, and gold <WH2091>: the workmanship <WH4399> of thy tabrets <WH8596> and of thy pipes <WH5345> was prepared <WH3559> in thee in the day <WH3117> that thou wast created <WH1254>.

Thou art the anointed <WH4473> cherub <WH3742> that covereth <WH5526>; and I have set <WH5414> thee so: thou wast upon the holy <WH6944> mountain <WH2022> of God <WH430>; thou hast walked up and down <WH1980> in the midst <WH8432> of the stones <WH68> of fire <WH784>.
Thou wast perfect <WH8549> in thy ways <WH1870> from the day <WH3117> that thou wast created <WH1254>, till iniquity <WH5766> was found <WH4672> in thee.

By the multitude <WH7230> of thy merchandise <WH7404> they have filled <WH4390> the midst <WH8432> of thee with violence <WH2555>, and thou hast sinned <WH2398>: therefore I will cast thee as profane <WH2490> out of the mountain <WH2022> of God <WH430>: and I will destroy <WH6> thee, O covering <WH5526> cherub <WH3742>, from the midst <WH8432> of the stones <WH68> of fire <WH784>.

Thine heart <WH3820> was lifted up <WH1361> because of thy beauty <WH3308>, thou hast corrupted <WH7843> thy wisdom <WH2451> by reason of <WH5921> thy brightness <WH3314>: I will cast <WH7993> thee to the ground <WH776>, I will lay <WH5414> thee before <WH6440> kings <WH4428>, that they may behold <WH7200> thee.

Thou hast defiled <WH2490> thy sanctuaries <WH4720> by the multitude <WH7230> of thine iniquities <WH5771>, by the iniquity <WH5766> of thy traffick <WH7404>; therefore will I bring forth <WH3318> a fire <WH784> from the midst <WH8432> of thee, it shall devour <WH398> thee, and I will bring <WH5414> thee to ashes <WH665> upon the earth <WH776> in the sight <WH5869> of all them that behold <WH7200> thee.
All they that know <WH3045> thee among the people <WH5971> shall be astonished <WH8074> at thee: thou shalt be a terror <WH1091>, and never <WH369> shalt thou be any more <WH5704> <WH5769>.
¶ Again the word <WH1697> of the LORD <WH3068> came unto me, saying <WH559>,
Son <WH1121> of man <WH120>, set <WH7760> thy face <WH6440> against Zidon <WH6721>, and prophesy <WH5012> against it,

And say <WH559>, Thus saith <WH559> the Lord <WH136> GOD <WH3069>; Behold, I am against thee, O Zidon <WH6721>; and I will be glorified <WH3513> in the midst <WH8432> of thee: and they shall know <WH3045> that I am the LORD <WH3068>, when I shall have executed <WH6213> judgments <WH8201> in her, and shall be sanctified <WH6942> in her.

For I will send <WH7971> into her pestilence <WH1698>, and blood <WH1818> into her streets <WH2351>; and the wounded <WH2491> shall be judged <WH5307> in the midst <WH8432> of her by the sword <WH2719> upon her on every side <WH5439>; and they shall know <WH3045> that I am the LORD <WH3068>.

¶ And there shall be no more a pricking <WH3992> brier <WH5544> unto the house <WH1004> of Israel <WH3478>, nor any grieving <WH3510> thorn <WH6975> of all that are round about <WH5439> them, that despised <WH7590> them; and they shall know <WH3045> that I am the Lord <WH136> GOD <WH3069>.

Thus saith <WH559> the Lord <WH136> GOD <WH3069>; When I shall have gathered <WH6908> the house <WH1004> of Israel <WH3478> from the people <WH5971> among whom they are scattered <WH6327>, and shall be sanctified <WH6942> in them in the sight <WH5869> of the heathen <WH1471>, then shall they dwell <WH3427> in their land <WH127> that I have given <WH5414> to my servant <WH5650> Jacob <WH3290>.

And they shall dwell <WH3427> safely <WH983> therein, and shall build <WH1129> houses <WH1004>, and plant <WH5193> vineyards <WH3754>; yea, they shall dwell <WH3427> with confidence <WH983>, when I have executed <WH6213> judgments <WH8201> upon all those that despise <WH7590> them round about <WH5439> them; and they shall know <WH3045> that I am the LORD <WH3068> their God <WH430>.
